title: 820-00165 Shuts down instead of sleeping.
message: I have this board that works normally except it's shutting down instead of sleeping. It was this board: [URL="https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/6989-solved-820-00165-no-3-3v-on-pin1-of-spi-rom"][SOLVED]820-00165 - No 3.3V on Pin1 of SPI-ROM[/URL]  Whether it's manually being put to sleep or just going into sleep mode it needs to be turned back on with the power button. Goes through full bootup. Has anyone seen this before? It's new to me.

title: 820-00165 Shuts down instead of sleeping.
message: This can be anything, corroded resistor/trace, crap under SMC/CPU.....this will suck :(
